prompt: Create a sleek, modern analytics dashboard page with a light gray background (#F5F5F5). The page should feature a top app bar with the title 'Analytics Overview' in bold black text and a settings icon on the right. Below the app bar, include a horizontal row of three metric cards displaying 'Active Users' (12,345), 'Total Sales' ($18,900), and 'Engagement Rate' (4.5%) with green accent colors, icons (person, currency, trending_up), and subtle shadows for depth. Each card should have rounded corners (12px radius) and consistent padding (16px). Below the cards, add a bar chart visualization with a blue gradient fill, occupying 300px in height, enclosed in a card with a slight shadow. At the bottom, include a compact data table with columns for 'Date', 'Users', 'Sales', and 'Engagement', using alternating row colors (white and light gray) for readability. Ensure 16px padding throughout the layout and a clean, minimalistic aesthetic with a column-based structure.
